mn152:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava gajangalayam viharati suveluvane.
mn152:2.1: Atha kho uttaro manavo parasiviyantevasi yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
mn152:2.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho uttaram manavam parasiviyantevasim bhagava etadavoca:
mn152:2.4: “Deseti, bho gotama, parasiviyo brahmano savakanam indriyabhavanan”ti.
mn152:2.5: “Yatha katham pana, uttara, deseti parasiviyo brahmano savakanam indriyabhavanan”ti?
mn152:2.6: “Idha, bho gotama, cakkhuna rupam na passati, sotena saddam na sunati—
mn152:2.7: evam kho, bho gotama, deseti parasiviyo brahmano savakanam indriyabhavanan”ti.
mn152:2.8: “Evam sante kho, uttara, andho bhavitindriyo bhavissati, badhiro bhavitindriyo bhavissati;
mn152:2.10: Andho hi, uttara, cakkhuna rupam na passati, badhiro sotena saddam na sunati”ti.
mn152:2.11: Evam vutte, uttaro manavo parasiviyantevasi tunhibhuto mankubhuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhayanto appatibhano nisidi.
mn152:3.1: Atha kho bhagava uttaram manavam parasiviyantevasim tunhibhutam mankubhutam pattakkhandham adhomukham pajjhayantam appatibhanam viditva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
mn152:3.2: “annatha kho, ananda, deseti parasiviyo brahmano savakanam indriyabhavanam, annatha ca panananda, ariyassa vinaye anuttara indriyabhavana hoti”ti.
mn152:3.4: yam bhagava ariyassa vinaye anuttaram indriyabhavanam deseyya. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
mn152:3.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
mn152:4.2: Idhananda, bhikkhuno cakkhuna rupam disva uppajjati manapam, uppajjati amanapam, uppajjati manapamanapam.
mn152:4.4: ‘uppannam kho me idam manapam, uppannam amanapam, uppannam manapamanapam.
mn152:4.8: Tassa tam uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati;
mn152:4.10: Seyyathapi, ananda, cakkhuma puriso ummiletva va nimileyya, nimiletva va ummileyya;
mn152:4.11: evameva kho, ananda, yassa kassaci evamsigham evamtuvatam evamappakasirena uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati, upekkha santhati—
mn152:4.12: ayam vuccatananda, ariyassa vinaye anuttara indriyabhavana cakkhuvinneyyesu rupesu.
mn152:5.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhuno sotena saddam sutva uppajjati manapam, uppajjati amanapam, uppajjati manapamanapam.
mn152:5.3: ‘uppannam kho me idam manapam, uppannam amanapam, uppannam manapamanapam.
mn152:5.7: Tassa tam uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati;
mn152:5.9: Seyyathapi, ananda, balava puriso appakasireneva accharam pahareyya;
mn152:5.10: evameva kho, ananda, yassa kassaci evamsigham evamtuvatam evamappakasirena uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati, upekkha santhati—
mn152:5.11: ayam vuccatananda, ariyassa vinaye anuttara indriyabhavana sotavinneyyesu saddesu.
mn152:6.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhuno ghanena gandham ghayitva uppajjati manapam, uppajjati amanapam, uppajjati manapamanapam.
mn152:6.3: ‘uppannam kho me idam manapam, uppannam amanapam, uppannam manapamanapam.
mn152:6.7: Tassa tam uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati;
mn152:6.9: Seyyathapi, ananda, isakampone padumapalase udakaphusitani pavattanti, na santhanti;
mn152:6.10: evameva kho, ananda, yassa kassaci evamsigham evamtuvatam evamappakasirena uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati, upekkha santhati—
mn152:6.11: ayam vuccatananda, ariyassa vinaye anuttara indriyabhavana ghanavinneyyesu gandhesu.
mn152:7.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhuno jivhaya rasam sayitva uppajjati manapam, uppajjati amanapam, uppajjati manapamanapam.
mn152:7.3: ‘uppannam kho me idam manapam, uppannam amanapam, uppannam manapamanapam.
mn152:7.7: Tassa tam uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati;
mn152:7.9: Seyyathapi, ananda, balava puriso jivhagge khelapindam samyuhitva appakasirena vameyya;
mn152:7.10: evameva kho, ananda, yassa kassaci evamsigham evamtuvatam evamappakasirena uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati, upekkha santhati—
mn152:7.11: ayam vuccatananda, ariyassa vinaye anuttara indriyabhavana jivhavinneyyesu rasesu.
mn152:8.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhuno kayena photthabbam phusitva uppajjati manapam, uppajjati amanapam, uppajjati manapamanapam.
mn152:8.3: ‘uppannam kho me idam manapam, uppannam amanapam, uppannam manapamanapam.
mn152:8.7: Tassa tam uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati;
mn152:8.9: Seyyathapi, ananda, balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya;
mn152:8.10: evameva kho, ananda, yassa kassaci evamsigham evamtuvatam evamappakasirena uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati, upekkha santhati—
mn152:8.11: ayam vuccatananda, ariyassa vinaye anuttara indriyabhavana kayavinneyyesu photthabbesu.
mn152:9.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhuno manasa dhammam vinnaya uppajjati manapam, uppajjati amanapam, uppajjati manapamanapam.
mn152:9.3: ‘uppannam kho me idam manapam, uppannam amanapam, uppannam manapamanapam.
mn152:9.7: Tassa tam uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati;
mn152:9.9: Seyyathapi, ananda, balava puriso divasamsantatte ayokatahe dve va tini va udakaphusitani nipateyya.
mn152:9.10: Dandho, ananda, udakaphusitanam nipato, atha kho nam khippameva parikkhayam pariyadanam gaccheyya;
mn152:9.11: evameva kho, ananda, yassa kassaci evamsigham evamtuvatam evamappakasirena uppannam manapam uppannam amanapam uppannam manapamanapam nirujjhati, upekkha santhati—
mn152:9.12: ayam vuccatananda, ariyassa vinaye anuttara indriyabhavana manovinneyyesu dhammesu.
mn152:9.13: Evam kho, ananda, ariyassa vinaye anuttara indriyabhavana hoti.
mn152:10.2: Idhananda, bhikkhuno cakkhuna rupam disva uppajjati manapam, uppajjati amanapam, uppajjati manapamanapam.
mn152:10.3: So tena uppannena manapena uppannena amanapena uppannena manapamanapena attiyati harayati jigucchati.
mn152:10.8: manasa dhammam vinnaya uppajjati manapam, uppajjati amanapam, uppajjati manapamanapam.
mn152:10.9: So tena uppannena manapena uppannena amanapena uppannena manapamanapena attiyati harayati jigucchati.
mn152:10.10: Evam kho, ananda, sekho hoti patipado.
mn152:11-15.2: Idhananda, bhikkhuno cakkhuna rupam disva uppajjati manapam, uppajjati amanapam, uppajjati manapamanapam.
mn152:11-15.3: So sace akankhati: ‘patikule appatikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, appatikulasanni tattha viharati.

mn152:11-15.6: Sace akankhati: ‘appatikule ca patikule ca patikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, patikulasanni tattha viharati.

mn152:17.1: Iti kho, ananda, desita maya ariyassa vinaye anuttara indriyabhavana, desito sekho patipado, desito ariyo bhavitindriyo.
mn152:18.1: Yam kho, ananda, satthara karaniyam savakanam hitesina anukampakena anukampam upadaya, katam vo tam maya.
mn152:18.2: Etani, ananda, rukkhamulani, etani sunnagarani, jhayathananda, ma pamadattha, ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha. Ayam vo amhakam anusasani”ti.
mn152:18.4: Attamano ayasma anando bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
